name: shorvan
author: Ivan Cavero
description: Shorvan is a URL shortener that helps you shorten links. Developed by Ivan Cavero

scripts.deploy: git checkout main && git merge develop && npm version patch -m 'Release: %s' && git push origin main && git checkout develop && git push origin develop
